lines.text:
[singing]
Listen to the mockingbird! / Listen to the mockingbird! / Oh, the mockingbird is singin' in the tree. / Listen to the mockingbird! / Listen to the mockingbird!

[singing]
Oh, my gosh, I'm hungry! Meow-wow-wow. / Oh, my tummy's empty! Meow-wow-wow. / I want a bird, a sparrow, quail! Meow-wow-wow. / Oh, isn't this an awful sad tale! Meow-wow-wow.
